item.title: 2020 Events
item.description: May 13, 12:20pm English Radical Texts: Poetry, Politics, & Performance, Modern Poets for Modern People Trevor Day School Livestreaming Jeff on Facebook. February 16, Sunday at 3pm Boog City at Bowery Poetry Club Jeff reads with Andrei Codrescu and others February 13, 6:30 A reception and triple book launch for a new expanded Party Everywhere, with Barry Wallenstein’s Time on the Move and A.D. Coleman’s Poetic License/Justice. January 19, 2-8pm Steve Dalachinsky Memorial @ Artists Space, 11 Cortlandt Alley, NYC
